title: promotional wins not counting?
body: In the past two days (6th and 7th March 2018), I have had a promotional win not count on two occasions; one per respective date. Is anyone else experiencing this issue? Is there some way to get these wins added? Thanks for any input.

replies.body: Unforunately there is no way for Riot to manually add those wins, however to prevent it happening again I'd recommend you **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) since it's an account specific issue and not something we can help you with here on boards.
